actions.text: Amendment SA 4773 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4773 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S8590-8591; text: CR S8590) To make available from additional appropriations for Operation and Maintenance, Army National Guard, up to $6,700,000 for the pilot program of the Army National Guard on the reintegration of members of the National Guard into civilian life after deployment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4773 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4773 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Dayton.

purpose: To make available from additional appropriations for Operation and Maintenance, Army National Guard, up to $6,700,000 for the pilot program of the Army National Guard on the reintegration of members of the National Guard into civilian life after deployment.
